name: codespaces_get-export-details-for-authenticated-user
description:
Gets information about an export of a codespace.

You must authenticate using a personal access token with the `codespace` scope to use this endpoint.

GitHub Apps must have read access to the `codespaces_lifecycle_admin` repository permission to use this endpoint.

export_id.description: The ID of the export operation, or `latest`. Currently only `latest` is currently supported.

$block.$h1: Fetches information about an export of a codespace.

$block: An export of a codespace. Also, latest export details for a codespace can be fetched with id = latest

$ul: **completed_at**: Completion time of the last export operation
**html_url**: Web url for the exported branch
**sha**: Git commit SHA of the exported branch
